summary: A haunted house player home in Falkreath by the cemetery.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a haunted house player home in Falkreath by the cemetery.  The house is abandoned except for a ghost dog who will become your follower. There\'s a vampire coffin in the basement that you can sleep in and a torture chamber down the hall with two victims in it.

The house also contains:
-Alchemy lab
-Enchanting table
-Cooking pot
-Bookcase
-Mannequins
-Display cases
-Storage chests
-Nine divine shrines
-A ghost dog follower

[u]Installing[/u]
Drag and drop .esp file into data folder and the coffin.nif file in the meshes folder.

[u]Uninstalling[/u]
Remove all items from the bookshelves, storage containers, mannequins, and display cases and then delete the .esp file.
author: ZeldaKitten
